title: Buttermilk chicken
methods: Start by combining the milk, half of the salt, black pepper, garlic powder, cayenne pepper and all of the hot sauce in a large bowl.
Marinate the chicken for minimum of 30 mins. Meanwhile, combine the flour, remaining salt, black pepper, garlic powder and cayenne pepper, and the paprika in another bowl.
Once the chicken is marinated, dip in the dry mix and coat. Do this 2 or 3 times.
Oil the air-fryer and fry the chicken for 15-20 mins until cooked and crispy.
